name: Starship (Exquisite Bytes)
description:
Gather all the ship parts scattered about each stage. Take them back to your starship for repairs to transcend into outer space!

Controls look upkneelmove left
move right
jump Ship Parts Navigation chipFuelAntimatterStabiliserAntimatter igniter

Tips

- Skillful play will spawn a cosmic flower. Kneel before the cosmic flower to attain the gift of the cosmos.

- Chasing score will make the game more difficult.

- Don't tread on the worms!
